com.opengamma.strata.pricer.bond

Class BondFutureOptionMarginedTradePricer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opengamma.strata.pricer.bond.BondFutureOptionMarginedTradePricer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlackBondFutureOptionMarginedTradePricer

    public abstract class BondFutureOptionMarginedTradePricer
extends Object
    Pricer for bond future option trades with daily margin.

    This function provides the ability to price an BondFutureOptionTrade. The option must be based on daily margin.

    Implementations must be immutable and thread-safe functions.

      • getProductPricer

        protected abstract BondFutureOptionMarginedProductPricer getProductPricer()
        Returns the pricer used to price the product underlying the trade.

      • price

        public double price(BondFutureOptionTrade trade,
                    LegalEntityDiscountingProvider ratesProvider,
                    BondFutureProvider futureProvider)
        Calculates the price of the bond future option trade.

        The price of the trade is the price on the valuation date.

        Parameters:
        trade - the trade to price
        ratesProvider - the rates provider
        futureProvider - the provider of future/option pricing data
        Returns:
        the price of the product, in decimal form

      • presentValue

        public CurrencyAmount presentValue(BondFutureOptionTrade trade,
                                   LocalDate valuationDate,
                                   double currentOptionPrice,
                                   double lastClosingPrice)
        Calculates the present value of the bond future option trade from the current option price.

        The present value of the product is the value on the valuation date.

        Parameters:
        trade - the trade to price
        valuationDate - the valuation date; required to asses if the trade or last closing price should be used
        currentOptionPrice - the option price on the valuation date
        lastClosingPrice - the last closing price
        Returns:
        the present value

      • presentValue

        public CurrencyAmount presentValue(BondFutureOptionTrade trade,
                                   LegalEntityDiscountingProvider ratesProvider,
                                   BondFutureProvider futureProvider,
                                   double lastClosingPrice)
        Calculates the present value of the bond future option trade.

        The present value of the product is the value on the valuation date.

        Parameters:
        trade - the trade to price
        ratesProvider - the rates provider
        futureProvider - the provider of future/option pricing data
        lastClosingPrice - the last closing price
        Returns:
        the present value

      • presentValueSensitivity

        public PointSensitivities presentValueSensitivity(BondFutureOptionTrade trade,
                                                  LegalEntityDiscountingProvider ratesProvider,
                                                  BondFutureProvider futureProvider)
        Calculates the present value sensitivity of the bond future option trade.

        The present value sensitivity of the trade is the sensitivity of the present value to the underlying curves.

        Parameters:
        trade - the trade to price
        ratesProvider - the rates provider
        futureProvider - the provider of future/option pricing data
        Returns:
        the present value curve sensitivity of the trade
